page.title: 10The Sandguide
page.content: Cedric Robinson has a unique job-he is the official guide for Kent Sands, on the northern side of Morecambe Bay. The Sandguide is a traditional post, given to somebody who has a special knowledge of the treacherous and ever- changing sands. The job is to guide parties over the sands, along a 'path' linking Kents Bank with Arnside.This route was used by coaches many years ago and recently Cedric guided a party of horse drawn coaches led by Prince Philip.In summer Cedric takes many groups of walkers. Cedric comes from along line of fishermen and still follows this work at times. He lives in a humble cottage near the shore,where his wife breeds Chihuahua dogs.Cedric has written two books about his lifestyle and has been featured in television programmes.
